whoIAm.subtitle: Who I Am
whoIAm.content: Hi! I'm Berna Kocalar, a passionate web developer with a love for creating beautiful and functional websites.

experience.title: Experience
experience.content: 5+ years of web development experience, working with modern frameworks and technologies to build scalable applications.

skills.title: Skills
skills.subtitle: Technical Expertise
skills.content: React, Next.js, TypeScript, TailwindCSS, Node.js, and more. Always learning and adapting to new technologies.

hobbies.title: Hobbies
hobbies.subtitle: Beyond Coding
hobbies.content: When I'm not coding, I enjoy reading books, traveling to new places, and exploring the latest tech trends.

services.readixon: A Wattpad-like platform for writers to create, publish, and share their stories with a community.
services.nestforyou: A platform for sharing and organizing personal projects and ideas.
services.movieapp: An IMDb-like personal movie tracker with private reviews and detailed insights.
services.weatherapp: A real-time weather application providing forecasts and current conditions.
services.taskmanager: A productivity tool for managing daily tasks and collaborating with teams.
